mapper.select: select id, creator, last_editor as lastEditor, create_date as createDate, last_edit_date as lastEditDate, deleted, user_name as userName ,user_type as userType, sex, account, password, security, email, phone, address, last_login_time as lastLoginTime, is_admin as isAdmin, is_lock as isLock, lock_time as lockTime, log_out as logOut, log_out_time as logOutTime from t_zhs_user_info
